text: <@U22PNRAJD> I'm wondering if there is anyone we can get in touch with about a marketplace submission - All of our templates were just approved except for 2 packs with no message why they were declined. I'm hoping that there may be a way for us to see what happened/get feedback so we can get these 2 packs live in the marketplace.
Hi! <@U22PNRAJD> is out right now, but I'll look into this for you!

Hi Reg, those should have been approved, apologies for the mishap, I’ll resolve the issue now.
For future reference, if an asset isn’t approved you will receive an email with the reason(s) why.
I just updated the listings so that they’re approved. You will see the update in your listings manager, but they may take up to 3 hours to be updated in the marketplace due to caching.
No problem! Apologies again for the confusion.
